name: Lcdprogressbar
tagline: LcdProgressBar is an Arduino library for displaying a progress bar in LCD display.
body:
# What is Lcdprogressbar
LcdProgressBar is an Arduino library for displaying a progress bar in LCD display.

## Dependences
The LCD display must be previously initialized. This library uses LiquedCrystal library for displaying.

# Expected result
- ![LcbProgressBar Demo](https://www.dropbox.com/s/g4reucn95znn7yc/LcdProgressBar-2s.gif?dl=0)
- [Video on Youtube](https://youtu.be/3SRARTk7fZY)
